Heaven.quote: The heavens declare the glory of God. (Psalm 19:1)

Earth.quote: The earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof. (Psalm 24:1)

Sea.quote: The sea is His, for He made it. (Psalm 95:5)

Life.quote: In Him was life, and that life was the light of all mankind. (John 1:4)

Death.quote: I hold the keys of death and Hades. (Revelation 1:18)

Time.quote: A thousand years in your sight are like a day that has just gone by. (Psalm 90:4)

Space.quote: Do I not fill heaven and earth? declares the Lord. (Jeremiah 23:24)

Light.quote: God is light; in him there is no darkness at all. (1 John 1:5)

Wisdom.quote: The Lord by wisdom founded the earth. (Proverbs 3:19)

Love.quote: God is love. Whoever lives in love lives in God. (1 John 4:16)

Justice.quote: Justice and judgment are the habitation of thy throne. (Psalm 89:14)

Creation.quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Nature.quote: Ask the beasts, and they will teach you. (Job 12:7)

Dreams.quote: God speaks in dreams, in visions of the night. (Job 33:15)
